Key: Oh, darling. Welcome home!
Whoa! You scared me! What are you doing, Miku?

Gosh, darling, you're so rude.
I was waiting for you.

Oh. Well, I was just surprised to open the door
and see you here. Sorry about that Miku.

Hehe. I'm not mad, so don't you worry. Anyways, I
did see a lot of that cute side of yours earlier.

Oh, um... Hey, Miku...? Can you forget about our
date from earlier?
Awww. But you were so cute, darling.

That's what's embarrassing! Miku, you were in a
nurse's outfit. Wouldn't you be embarrassed if I
remembered that forever?

Oh, really? I wouldn't mind you seeing me in any
outfit. I mean, that was nothing. I am an idol,
after all.

(I guess she has a point... Oh, that's right, I
was looking for Maria.)
Hey, Miku. Have you seen Maria?

Arusu-san? No, I haven't～ It doesn't seem like
she's home yet, either～

She's not home yet...? Oh, that's right. I was
looking for her at school.

(Then does that mean she's still at school? That's
not good, I just left her there.)

Sorry, Miku. I've got to go pick up Maria. I know
you came all the way over here, but I'm sorry.
It's totally fine～ In that case, I'll go with you～
...What?

(And so Miku and I went to go pick
up Maria together.)
It feels weird to walk to school with you, Miku.

Oh, come to think of it, you're right! I'm happy
because I can pretend we're going to school.

Haha. Well, it is evening... Anyways, can I ask
you something?
Sure～ What is it, darling?

It's about Maria. I wonder what it is
that she wants.

Gosh, darling. You're with me, but you're talking
to me about another girl?
Oh, sorry. I couldn't help it...

"Hehe, I'm only kidding. Hmm... You mean the "what
is love" thing, right?"

Yeah. Maria said she wants to learn from us. But
I'm not sure if I'm doing a good job.

Hehe. I think you're doing okay. I mean, I feel so
much love just by being with you.
R-Really?

Yes, of course! Maybe Arusu-san just
wants your love?

I don't know about that. I don't think so. But... I
feel better just talking about it with you.
Hehe. You're welcome.
Hey, Maria! Where are you?
Darling, could that be Arusu-san?
...You're right. There she is.
So you've found me.

What's the matter, Maria? Did you find something
interesting at school?
...Yes. There was something like that.
What was it?

More importantly... I'm happy that you've come to
look for me.
M-Maria?! What's the matter...?!
Just as I thought. The reaction I expected.
Th-The reaction you expected? What do you mean?

I thought that if I did this, you'd come looking
for me. If you do this in a game, your heart
skips a beat, right?
Maria...

(I knew it. I think Maria is slowly starting to
change.)

Grrr. Darling, are you getting all lovey-dovey
with Arusu-san?
Oh...?! N-No, Miku. It's not like that.
...Shido, do you not feel anything toward me?
Huh...? No, that's not true.
Oh, so your heart was pounding?
Yeah, it was... Crap!
So it's true. Ohhhh. I seeeeee.

*Groan*... Her eyes are piercing. Anyways Maria,
let's go home. You're okay with that, right Miku?
Yes. Understood.
I don't mind. Have you had enough, darling?
Argh! Let's just go home, you guys.
Darling!

(I held Miku's hand as I started to walk. I looked
over and Maria was smiling.)
Shido...?
Hm...? Oh, sure.

(Maria slowly walked beside me, and I took her
hand. The three of us began to walk home together.
Maria has truly became part of our family.)

(We continued to hold each others' hands as we
walked home.)
